Detailed Description

The Area class represents parent class for all possible definition areas for the presented functions. Each of the 3 functions has their 3 definition areas.

Member Function Documentation

bool Area::isIn ( vector< double >  x  ) 

The function isIn checks if a point is in the definition area.

Parameters:
x is a point
Returns:
bool value: true --- is inside, false --- isn't inside.
